title: From Call of Duty to Code: How Running an Esports Org Shaped My Software Engineering Approach
excerpt: The unexpected parallels between competitive gaming leadership and software engineering. How managing a professional Call of Duty organization taught me communication, strategy, and team dynamics that directly translate to building software with peers.

title: Understanding Finite Automata: A Beginner's Guide to State Machines
excerpt: Learn the fundamentals of finite automata and state machines. This guide covers deterministic finite automata (DFA), non-deterministic finite automata (NFA), and practical applications in software engineering and compiler design.

title: Recursion Explained: From Basics to Advanced Patterns
excerpt: A comprehensive guide to understanding recursion in programming. Learn recursive thinking, common patterns, when to use recursion vs iteration, and how to avoid stack overflow errors. Includes examples in JavaScript and Python.

title: Time Complexity and Big O Notation: A Practical Guide
excerpt: Master Big O notation and time complexity analysis. Learn how to analyze algorithm efficiency, compare different approaches, and optimize your code. Essential knowledge for technical interviews and efficient programming.

title: Understanding REST APIs: Design Principles and Best Practices
excerpt: Learn how to design and implement RESTful APIs. This guide covers HTTP methods, status codes, resource naming conventions, authentication, and common patterns for building scalable web APIs.

title: React Hooks Deep Dive: useState, useEffect, and Custom Hooks
excerpt: Master React Hooks with practical examples. Learn useState for state management, useEffect for side effects, and how to create reusable custom hooks. Includes common patterns and best practices for modern React development.

title: Database Normalization: From First to Third Normal Form
excerpt: Understand database normalization and why it matters. Learn about 1NF, 2NF, and 3NF with practical examples. Discover how proper normalization reduces data redundancy and improves database performance.

title: Building My First Production Mobile App: Lessons Learned
excerpt: Reflecting on the journey of building homebase, a local-first family management app, and the technical decisions that shaped its architecture.

title: Why I'm Pursuing Cloud Development & Operations
excerpt: Exploring my decision to specialize in cloud technologies and how it aligns with the future of software engineering.
